description:
In this cooking class, I will teach you how to cook simple and easy to make popular Japanese traditional dishes. The dishes included in this lecture is so healthy and you don't have to worry about eating more. This course is for cooks of all levels who enjoy Japanese food.

In this course, you will learn:

  • Recipes of some traditional Japanese dishes
  • Japanese cooking techniques
  • Common ingredients used in Japanese cooking
  • Why Japanese dishes helped me lose weight

I will be teaching you how to cook the following popular dishes the basic way!

  • Nikujaga
  • Karaage
  • Yakiudon
  • Japanese Curry

And many more!

What are the requirements?

  • Safe and clean cooking environment
  • Basic cookware and utensils

When my wife was pregnant, we changed the type of food we eat and started to cook mainly Japanese food at home. We didn't change the amount of food we take, just the type of food we eat but we didn't worry about her getting overweight like before.

The lessons in this cooking class are taught in English. Each lecture has three parts, the first part gives you the 7 steps in making the dish. The second part is the cooking video and the last part of the lecture are useful tips and notes for each recipe.
title: Cooking Class: 12 Japanese Food That Helped Me Lose Weight
instructors: Haamalu Limited Liability Company, Pearl Ishizaki
